channel.title: Changing message buttons
channel.description:
I am trying to move a button from beside report abuse to where it is ( its on the right side of it ) and i'm not sure as to where the screen coords are for their clickable. anyone able to shine some light on this for me i'm pretty sure its in the mudclient class but i'm abit lost
thanks
